verses.verse: לְדָוִ֡ד <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> to יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Unto thee O LORD נַפְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> my soul אֶשָּֽׂא׃ <WH5375> do I lift up

אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י <WH430> O my God בְּךָ֣ בָ֭טַחְתִּי <WH982> I trust אַל־ <WH408> not אֵב֑וֹשָׁה <WH954> in thee let me not be ashamed אַל־ <WH408> nay יַֽעַלְצ֖וּ <WH5970> triumph אֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> let not mine enemies לִֽי׃

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> Indeed כָּל־ <WH3605> who קֹ֭וֶיךָ <WH6960> Yea let none that wait לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <WH954> on thee be ashamed יֵ֝בֹ֗שׁוּ <WH954> let them be ashamed הַבּוֹגְדִ֥ים <WH898> which transgress רֵיקָֽם׃ <WH7387> without cause
דְּרָכֶ֣יךָ <WH1870> me thy ways יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD הוֹדִיעֵ֑נִי <WH3045> Shew אֹ֖רְחוֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH734> me thy paths לַמְּדֵֽנִי׃ <WH3925> teach

הַדְרִ֘יכֵ֤נִי <WH1869> Lead בַאֲמִתֶּ֨ךָ ׀ <WH571> me in thy truth וְֽלַמְּדֵ֗נִי <WH3925> and teach כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַ֭תָּה <WH859> You אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> me for thou [art] the God יִשְׁעִ֑י <WH3468> of my salvation אוֹתְךָ֥ <WH854> for קִ֝וִּ֗יתִי <WH6960> on thee do I wait כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> all the day

זְכֹר־ <WH2142> Remember רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ <WH7356> thy tender mercies יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD וַחֲסָדֶ֑יךָ <WH2617> and thy lovingkindnesses כִּ֖י <WH3588> for מֵעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> for they [have been] ever of old הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like

חַטֹּ֤אות <WH2403> not the sins נְעוּרַ֨י ׀ <WH5271> of my youth וּפְשָׁעַ֗י <WH6588> nor my transgressions אַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֫זְכֹּ֥ר <WH2142> Remember כְּחַסְדְּךָ֥ <WH2617> according to thy mercy זְכָר־ <WH2142> remember לִי־ אַ֑תָּה <WH859> you לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> sake טוּבְךָ֣ <WH2898> thou me for thy goodness' יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> sake O LORD

טוֹב־ <WH2896> Good וְיָשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> and upright יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [is] the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> after that יוֹרֶ֖ה <WH3384> therefore will he teach חַטָּאִ֣ים <WH2400> sinners בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> in the way
יַדְרֵ֣ךְ <WH1869> will he guide עֲ֭נָוִים <WH6035> The meek בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> in judgment וִֽילַמֵּ֖ד <WH3925> will he teach עֲנָוִ֣ים <WH6035> and the meek דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH1870> his way

כָּל־ <WH3605> All אָרְח֣וֹת <WH734> All the paths יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> [are] mercy וֶאֱמֶ֑ת <WH571> and truth לְנֹצְרֵ֥י <WH5341> unto such as keep בְ֝רִית֗וֹ <WH1285> his covenant וְעֵדֹתָֽיו׃ <WH5713> and his testimonies

לְמַֽעַן־ <WH4616> sake שִׁמְךָ֥ <WH8034> For thy name's יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> sake O LORD וְֽסָלַחְתָּ֥ <WH5545> pardon לַ֝עֲוֹנִ֗י <WH5771> mine iniquity כִּ֣י <WH3588> for רַב־ <WH7227> for it [is] great הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

מִי־ <WH4310> Who זֶ֣ה <WH2088> he הָ֭אִישׁ <WH376> What man יְרֵ֣א <WH3373> [is] he that feareth יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Jehovah י֝וֹרֶ֗נּוּ <WH3384> archer בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way יִבְחָֽר׃ <WH977> [that] he shall choose
נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <WH5315> His soul בְּט֣וֹב <WH2896> at ease תָּלִ֑ין <WH3885> shall dwell וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ <WH2233> and his seed יִ֣ירַשׁ <WH3423> shall inherit אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth
ס֣וֹד <WH5475> The secret יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD לִירֵאָ֑יו <WH3373> [is] with them that fear וּ֝בְרִית֗וֹ <WH1285> them his covenant לְהוֹדִיעָֽם׃ <WH3045> him and he will shew

עֵינַ֣י <WH5869> Mine eyes תָּ֭מִיד <WH8548> [are] ever אֶל־ <WH413> toward יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> toward the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הֽוּא־ <WH1931> He יוֹצִ֖יא <WH3318> for he shall pluck מֵרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7568> out of the net רַגְלָֽי׃ <WH7272> my feet

פְּנֵה־ <WH6437> Turn אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me וְחָנֵּ֑נִי <WH2603> thee unto me and have mercy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For יָחִ֖יד <WH3173> upon me for I [am] desolate וְעָנִ֣י <WH6041> and afflicted אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I
צָר֣וֹת <WH6869> The troubles לְבָבִ֣י <WH3824> of my heart הִרְחִ֑יבוּ <WH7337> are enlarged מִ֝מְּצֽוּקוֹתַ֗י <WH4691> of my distresses הוֹצִיאֵֽנִי׃ <WH3318> [O] bring thou me out
רְאֵ֣ה <WH7200> Look עָ֭נְיִי <WH6040> upon mine affliction וַעֲמָלִ֑י <WH5999> and my pain וְ֝שָׂ֗א <WH5375> and forgive לְכָל־ <WH3605> all חַטֹּאותָֽי׃ <WH2403> all my sins

רְאֵֽה־ <WH7200> Consider אוֹיְבַ֥י <WH341> mine enemies כִּי־ <WH3588> for רָ֑בּוּ <WH7231> for they are many וְשִׂנְאַ֖ת <WH8130> and they hate חָמָ֣ס <WH2555> me with cruel שְׂנֵאֽוּנִי׃ <WH8135> hatred

שָׁמְרָ֣ה <WH8104> O keep נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> my soul וְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי <WH5337> and deliver אַל־ <WH408> not אֵ֝ב֗וֹשׁ <WH954> me let me not be ashamed כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חָסִ֥יתִי <WH2620> for I put my trust בָֽךְ׃
תֹּם־ <WH8537> Let integrity וָיֹ֥שֶׁר <WH3476> and uprightness יִצְּר֑וּנִי <WH5341> preserve כִּ֝֗י <WH3588> for קִוִּיתִֽיךָ׃ <WH6960> me for I wait
פְּדֵ֣ה <WH6299> Redeem אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> O God אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> of all צָֽרוֹתָיו׃ <WH6869> out of all his troubles
